mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(REG_DT), 'YYYYMMDD') AS DAY, MST_CT_ID AS CATEGORY, SUM(USAGE) AS USAGE FROM FINANCE, (SELECT SET_MONTH AS FIRST_DAY, LAST_DAY(SET_MONTH) AS LAST_DAY FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYYMM') AS SET_MONTH FROM DUAL )) M WHERE ID = #{id} AND REG_DT BETWEEN M.FIRST_DAY AND M.LAST_DAY GROUP BY ROLLUP(TRUNC(REG_DT), MST_CT_ID)
